channel.title: Anyway to execute BATCH or MSDos commands via java?
channel.description:
Is there anyway to do this, as in, if i was wanting a batch file to open a file, i would put [code]open filename.etc[/code] but is there anyway of executing this via the java files?
Thanks

item.title: Anyway to execute BATCH or MSDos commands via java?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

ry60003333:

Write Java code that opens the file instead of messing around with making it run batch files…

Yes, but i use a batch file to download updates to my client, so if people don’t want them they can just rightclick the file and delete the downloading bit, so i need it to be like exactly the same as batch, like “del file”

Read full topic
item.source: Anyway to execute BATCH or MSDos commands via java?
